name: MAKE\_EDGE
intent: Construct an Edge as adjacency relation between two Points.
mu\_action: μ encodes local weight/length/adjacency strength along E.
constraints: E is simple if it does not self-intersect.
chi\_action: STEPχ(E, χ) evolves any mode assignments along E (e.g. transport or phase shift) while preserving Ω-invariants such as total edge energy.
omega\_action: Ω(E) fixes global normalization for edge-associated quantities (e.g. integrated weight, conserved flux) relative to the ambient Ωχ-layer.
